message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV

This paper is about a neural machine translation system, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of a shared model architecture and transfer learning, which are topics related to machine learning (ML). Hence, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. The paper proposes a solution to enable multilingual translation, which involves the use of an artificial token and a shared vocabulary, indicating that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper mentions the use of image captioning as an example application, suggesting that it may also be relevant to the sub-category of cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition).
